data.title: Frederick II of Denmark + Sophie of Mecklenburg
data.meta_description: Frederick II of Denmark, b.1 JUL 1534, Haderslev, Denmark, son of Christian III Von Oldenburg King of Denmark And Norway + Dorothea of Saxe-Lauenburg; + Sophie of Mecklenburg, b.4 SEP 1557, Wismar, Mecklenburg, Germany
